description.ruby-sapphire:
A brutal ramming attack
using out-thrust horns.
description.emerald:
A brutal ramming attack
using out-thrust horns.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A brutal ramming
attack delivered
with a tough and
impressive horn.
description.diamond-pearl:

and impressive
horn, the user
rams into the foe 
with no letup.
